title: Daddy Yankee
content:
I’ve been scratching my head on this one.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [daddy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=daddy.jpg) | 112.87 KB |
author: samiam1973

comments.content: whatever it is, it’s obviously highly customized. altho i’m sure there was some initial base font that they worked from.
Its pretty bad it reads Patty Yankee and shows a caribbean looking guy with a NY Mets hat on. What an Irish Caribbean groove. Sad

looks like a yankee cap to me.  
a cheap, camo one, but a yankee cap regardless.
Sorry Ben, I was thinking of Pedro Martinez and he is on the Mets now. I know the reference was when he was on the Red Sox “Whoes your Daddy” but it still reads as Patty to me.
